title: Brooch, 1908
medium: Cut and entwinned ribbon silver, with basse-taille enamel
markings: CH and Assay Marks for Chester, England, 1908
provenance: Provenance: 2013 Museum gift from Judy F. Zankel, purchased by donor approximately 30 years ago in  English antiques shop.

tombstone.epitaph: Brooch, 1908. Cut and entwinned ribbon silver, with basse-taille enamel. Gift of Judy Francis Zankel. 2013-55-4.
